mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eternalcomment (erbNo, memberId, nickName, comment, parentNo, addDate, mno, profileImg) VALUES (#{erbNo}, #{memberId}, #{nickName}, #{comment}, #{parentNo}, now(), #{mno}, #{profileImg})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(comNo) FROM eternalcomment WHERE erbNo=#{erbNo}
SELECT * FROM eternalcomment WHERE erbNo=#{erbNo} ORDER BY parentNo, comNo LIMIT #{skip}, #{size}
